# UITextSmartQuotesType.no

**Case**

Disable smart quotes.

## Declaration

```swift
case no
```

## Constants

- **UITextSmartQuotesType.default**: Use the default smart quote behavior.
- **UITextSmartQuotesType.yes**: Enable smart quotes.

items.description: Use the default smart quote behavior.
